speaking.title: üéôÔ∏è Speaking Practice
speaking.subtitle: Improve your pronunciation with zero errors and for free using artificial intelligence.
speaking.instructions: Press the microphone button to read the sentence below. The algorithm will check your pronunciation.
speaking.errNotSupported: Your browser does not support speech recognition. Please use Chrome, Edge or Safari.
speaking.errNoMic: Microphone permission denied. Please allow it in browser settings.
speaking.feedExcellent: Excellent! Your pronunciation is very clear and correct.
speaking.feedGood: Good try! Try to pronounce a bit faster and clearer.
speaking.feedPoor: Your voice was not completely clear or I heard different words. Please try again.
